isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - SHORT SLEEPER AIR LINE CABINETS

svcsubproc.title: Remove 2 Passenger Side Air Line Cabinets on Short Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 77 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex head bolts (Item 1) securing front air line cabinet (Item 10) to the front air line cabinet support (Item 2), passenger side shown. Lay hex head bolts out of the way and save for installation.

Remove two hex head bolts (Item 1) securing rear air line cabinet (Item 11) to the rear air line cabinet support (Item 3), passenger side shown. Lay hex head bolts out of the way and save for installation.

Remove two finishing caps (Item 4, section A-A) from cap retaining washers (Item 5, section A-A) inside rear air line cabinet (Item 11), passenger side shown. Lay finishing caps out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two hex nuts (Item 6, section A-A) from weld studs (Item 7, section A-A) inside rear air line cabinet (Item 11), passenger side shown. Lay hex nuts out of the way and save for installation.

Remove two cap retainer washers (Item 5, section A-A) from weld studs (Item 7, section A-A) inside rear air line cabinet (Item 11), passenger side shown. Lay cap retainer washers out of the way and save for installation.

Remove air line bracket assembly weld stud plate (Item 8, section A-A) from inside front air line cabinet (Item 10), passenger side shown. Lay air line bracket assembly weld stud plate out of the way and save for installation.

Remove four hex head bolts (Item 9) securing front air line cabinet (Item 10) to upper passenger side sleeper wall (Item 12), passenger side shown. Lay hex head bolts out of the way and save for installation.

Once all mounting hardware has been removed, lift front air line cabinet (Item 10) up to clear mounting tab on the back of the cabinet and pull cabinet out, passenger side shown. Lay front air line cabinet out of the way and save for installation.

Remove four hex head bolts (Item 9) securing rear air line cabinet (Item 11) to upper passenger side sleeper wall (Item 12), passenger side shown. Lay hex head bolts out of the way and save for installation.

Once all mounting hardware has been removed, lift rear air line cabinet (Item 11) up to clear mounting tab on the back of the cabinet and pull cabinet out, passenger side shown. Lay rear air line cabinet out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 77. Passenger Side Air Line Cabinets on Short Sleeper Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 8. AIR LINE BRACKET ASSEMBLY WELD STUD PLATE

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove two driver side air line cabinets on sleeper cab.
